Mod0_Description: {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_A_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c} whenever {c_important}Earth Spike{/c} damages enemies who are Stunned, Immobilized, or Knocked Back.
Mod2_Description: {c_important}Earth Spike{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun for {c_number}[{buffduration:MOD_RANK_STUN}|1|]{/c} seconds.
simple_desc: Basic Skill: Hurl a spike of earth at an enemy.
Mod1_Description: Summon a second {c_important}Earth Spike{/c} when hitting an Immobilized or Stunned enemy.
name: Earth Spike
